LearnerPathwayItem.name: LearnerPathwayItem
LearnerPathwayItem.description: Represents a requirement with completion details in the Learner Pathway.

AcademicSessionId.description: The Academic Session in which the Learner Pathway Item is taken.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

Duration.description: The allocated length of time for the Learner Pathway Item.

DurationUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measurement for the duration.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearnerPathwayId.description: The Learner Pathway that contains the Learner Pathway Item.

LearnerProgramRequirementId.description: The Learner Program Requirement that the Learner Pathway Item satisfies.

LearningId.description: The Learning associated with the Learner Pathway Item.

LearningPathwayTemplateItemId.description: The Learning Pathway Template Item from which the Learner Pathway Item was created.

Name.description: The name of the Learner Pathway Item.

Season.description: Specifies the season in which the Learner Pathway Item is taken.

SequenceNumber.description: The display position of the Learner Pathway Item.

Type.description: Specifies the type of Learner Pathway Item.

Year.description: Specifies the year in which the Learner Pathway Item is taken.
